listitem.para: How many packets can be sent/received on a particular instance of a connection (a set of encryption/authentication keys for user packets) , from successful negotiation to expiry.
Default values and caveats are the same as for ipsec-max-bytes. This option uses a prefix without "B" for bytes.
When using Linux with nic-offload=packet set, Linux 6.7 or later is required.
